title: Provider Profile Setup
name: Name
documentVerifiedMessage: This document has been verified by admin. You cannot replace verified documents. Please contact admin if you need to update this document.
uploadFailed: Failed to upload document. Please try again.

unknownError: Unknown error occurred. Please check your internet connection and try again.
invalidFormat: Invalid file format. Please upload an image (JPG, PNG) or PDF.

pleaseEnterValidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
pleaseEnterValidPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid 10-digit phone number
experienceInvalid: Experience must be a number between 0 and 50
